Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two of the children exhibited a homozygous deficiency characterized by the absence of the 150 - kD form of Factor H and the presence , upon immunoblotting , of the 42 - kD Factor H - like protein 1 ( FHL - 1 ) and other FH - related protein ( FHR ) bands .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Factor H deficiency (homozygous) |

In this paragraph, the disease entity mentioned is "Factor H deficiency," specifically a homozygous type of this deficiency. The description of the symptoms, including the absence of the 150-kD form of Factor H and the presence of FHL-1 and other FHR bands upon immunoblotting, further supports this identification.

In this paragraph, the only entity that clearly refers to a disease is "Factor H deficiency," specifically a homozygous type of this deficiency. The description of the symptoms, including the absence of the 150-kD form of Factor H and the presence of FHL-1 and other FHR bands upon immunoblotting, further supports this identification. Other entities mentioned, such as "kD," "Factor H-like protein 1 (FHL-1)," and "FH-related proteins (FHR)," are not diseases but rather descriptive terms or related proteins.
